articles.author: Justine Calma
articles.title: Can banks push Bitcoin to clean up its act?
articles.description: Banks and asset managers have a big stake in Bitcoin, so Greenpeace wants them to crack down on the cryptocurrency’s pollution.
articles.content:

articles.title: Bitcoin could soar to $180,000 before the April 2024 halving as potential BlackRock ETF helps drive demand, Fundstrat says
articles.description: "We anticipate [a bitcoin ETF] would attract new investors and generate increased demand for bitcoin," Fundstrat said.
articles.content:
Wenjin Chen/Getty Images
